data.title: Buckley Mill, Uppermill, Saddleworth
data.meta_description: Converted in 2005, Buckley Mill is a central village development with allocated parking spaces and offers modern living throughout. This apartment is duplex benefitting from two fitted bedrooms (one of which En-Suite) and spacious lounge area. This first floor apartment is over two floors and in brief comprises of: entrance hallway, bathroom and two bedrooms (one En-Suite) to the first floor. The second floor features a lounge with Velux windows and separate kitchen/breakfast room.
data.text:
Valuation Policy during Covid-19

We have received a small number of enquiries regarding listing new properties for sale during the lockdown period. We are also aware that some estate agents are offering a ‘virtual valuation’ system so that properties can be listed at this time.

We have given this considerable thought and feel this is inappropriate and presently against Government instructions, although we can offer a limited listing service in certain circumstances. Those agents may feel they are gaining a market advantage but our view is that in most cases this will not be in the interest of vendors for the following reasons.

There are very few potential buyers out there willing to view houses and actual viewings should not take place anyway under lockdown. ‘Virtual’ viewings may result in conditional offers but these would be of little value whilst surveyors, lenders and solicitors are unable to proceed in the normal way. Potential purchasers are likely to want to try and renegotiate once an actual physical viewing can take place prior to completion, which could cause vendors much disappointment. There may be some cash buyers who may forego a survey and viewing but surely any offers would be ridiculously low.

Our view is that there is no point marketing to a virtually non-existent market. Our advice for most potential sellers is to let us know you are interested in coming on the market so that when the government gives us the go-ahead to start trading again we can swiftly do so. We have the capacity to value and market your house within days at the start of an emerging market which will give you the good chance of an early sale. Any houses marketed without proper photographs, sales particulars and floor plans will be at a serious disadvantage in an emerging market.

In exceptional circumstances where vendors need an urgent sale, whether on the market now or not, then please contact us as we will advise you taking each case on its individual merits. Our online auction service may be particularly suited to your needs.

Our aim is to continue to offer you a responsible & professional estate agency service in these very difficult times.

If you would like to book a free market appraisal please fill in the form below and we will call you to arrange an appointment at your convenience.

If you would like to book a free market appraisal please fill in the form below and we will call you to arrange an appointment at your convenience.

Tenure: Freehold

Converted in 2005, Buckley Mill is a central village development with allocated parking spaces and offers modern living throughout. This apartment is duplex benefitting from two fitted bedrooms (one of which En-Suite) and spacious lounge area.

This first floor apartment is over two floors and in brief comprises of: entrance hallway, bathroom and two bedrooms (one En-Suite) to the first floor. The second floor features a lounge with Velux windows and separate kitchen/breakfast room.

There are pleasing views out to the rear overlooking the River Tame and Uppermill Countryside further afield. Allocated parking is available on site and is accessed via a secure barrier system.

This central village location means you have all facilities within walking distance for day to day living. The apartment is fitted with a range of integral appliances and being offered to the market with no onward chain.

To view this duplex apartment call Kirkham Property.

COMMUNAL ENTRANCE Accessed via a secure intercom entry door with stone paved flooring and stairs to all floors.

APARTMENT HALLWAY With laminate flooring, under stairs storage and storage heater.

BEDROOM 12' 10" x 12' 9" (3.92m x 3.89m) With fitted carpeting, electric storage heater, two uPVC double glazed windows with views over River Tame, fitted wardrobes.

ENSUITE 8' 3" x 2' 10" (2.52m x 0.87m) Comprising three piece suite of low level wc, hand wash basin, enclosed shower cubicle, heated towel rail, extractor fan, tiled walls.

BEDROOM 14' 5" x 8' 3" (4.41m x 2.54m) With fitted carpeting, electric storage heater, two uPVC double glazed windows with views over River Tame, fitted wardrobes, storage cupboard.

LOUNGE 24' 10" x 14' 9" (7.57m x 4.50m) A light and airy space with three Velux roof windows and fitted blinds, two electric storage heaters, fitted carpeting, door to kitchen.

KITCHEN/BREAKFAST ROOM 14' 9" x 7' 6" (4.50m x 2.29m) Fitted with a range of wall and base units, coordinating work surfaces, 1 1/4 stainless steel sink and drainer, splash back tiling, integral appliances including electric oven, Zanussi electric hob, Baumatic extractor hood, Zanussi Fridge/Freezer, Zanussi dishwasher, plumbing for washer/dryer, breakfast bar, Velux roof window with fitted blind.

EXTERNALLY The apartment has an allocated parking space via a secure barrier system and there are also visitors parking spaces.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION TENURE: Leasehold - Solicitor to confirm details.

SERVICE CHARGE: Approximately £80 per month.

COUNCIL BAND: D

VIEWING ARRANGEMENTS: Strictly by appointment with the agents.
